title.narrative: Climate Action Enhancement Package 2: Tonga

description.narrative:
Tonga's capability in NGHGI database management, data collection and performance of QA/QC is enhanced.
Guidance and technical assistance provided and tools are produced which strengthen streamlining and integration of NDCs into National and Tonga regional plans and processes.
Publications and other awareness raising mediums related to the NDC are made available in Tonga.

Tonga's capability in NGHGI database management, data collection and performance of QA/QC is enhanced.
Guidance and technical assistance provided and tools are produced which strengthen streamlining and integration of NDCs into National and Tonga regional plans and processes.
Publications and other awareness raising mediums related to the NDC are made available in Tonga.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04518 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: 1. Information brochure on NDC printed 2. Banners on NDC printed

description.narrative: 1. Information brochure on NDC and banners printed and used at events 2. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of completed advisory outputs that inform the development of government green growth policies.
Publications and other awareness raising mediums related to the NDC are made available in Tonga

description.narrative: 1. Information brochure on NDC 2. Leaflet on success stories 3. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of green growth policies adopted by governments with GGGI’s support.
Tonga's NGHGI database for AFOLU, IPPU and Waste is established

description.narrative:
1. NGHGI database established for AFOLU, IPPU and Waste and data entry requirements and QA/QC procedures embedded with database
2. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of completed advisory outputs that inform the development of government green growth policies.
Tonga's capability in NGHGI database management, data collection and performance of QA/QC is enhanced

description.narrative:
1. NGHGI database established, operationalised and managed by Tonga Government
2. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of green growth policies adopted by governments with GGGI’s support.

Mitigation Technical Working group is trained in using the MRV software/tools and QA/QC requirements. Technical requirements to build a national GHGI in Tonga are understood. Tonga is able to complete national GHGI database with minimised gaps and perform QA/AC.

description.narrative: 1. Requirements for Technical Working Group knowledge defined 2. Instructions for data entry by Technical Working Group prepared 3. Training session(s) report on MRV software/tools 4. Evaluation of training shows that understanding of technical requirements to build a national GHGI database, how to minimise data gaps, how to use MRV software/tools and how to perform QA/QC has improved. 5. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of completed advisory outputs that inform the development of government green growth policies.
National and regional plans and processes reviewed and potential entry points for NDC integration identified.

description.narrative: 1. Review of national regional plans and processes 2. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of completed advisory outputs that inform the development of government green growth policies.
Guidance and technical assistance provided and tools are produced which strengthen streamlining and integration of NDCs into National and Tonga regional plans and processes

description.narrative: 1. Supporting framework in integrating NDC and national action plan. 2. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports. 3. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of green growth policies adopted by governments with GGGI’s support.

Supporting framework/tool for integrating NDCs and national action plans developed. This guidance document/tool will incorporate how Tonga's central and regional government agencies can identify potential climate actions with a focus on Tonga's priority NDC sectors and how these can be integrated into the NDC development and vice versa.

description.narrative: 1. Supporting framework/tool guidance document for integrating NDCs and national action plans available with a focus on Tonga's priority NDC sectors. 2. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of completed advisory outputs that inform the development of government green growth policies.

Training and associated capacity-development activities provided on integrating NDC considerations into antional and regional planning and focused on the central and Tongan regional agencies, and incorporating Tonga's priority NDC sectors.

description.narrative: 1. Training report and evaluation showing increased knowledge 2. Regular monthly monitoring reports, quarterly reviews and end of year results reports.

title.narrative: Number of completed advisory outputs that inform the development of government green growth policies.
Tonga achieves its commitments under the Paris Agreement, including its NDC and meeting the SDGs (7 and 13 in particular). The project contributes to GGGI SO1, SO2 and SO6
GHG emissions reduction from business as usual (MtCO2e)
Number of people supported to cope with climate change (millions)
